snippet: Gov. Rick Perry won’t be in his job forever, but when he does go he will leave behind a state full of agencies run by the people he put there.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry won’t be in his job forever, but when he does go he will leave behind a state full of agencies run by the people he put there.

headline.main: Perry’s World Will Go On, With or Without Him
headline.print_headline: Perry’s World Will Go On, With or Without Him
